goals__remit: Arla Foods is a cooperative owned by 11,200 farmers from seven EU member states (Germany, UK, Denmark, Sweden, Belgium, Luxembourg and The Netherlands). Arla produces dairy products and sells them globally in more than 100 countries under brands like LURPAK, CASTELLO, ARLA and PUCK.
